questions.text: List the customerName, city, and country for all customers ordered by their city alphabetically.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, city, country FROM customers ORDER BY city ASC

questions.text: List the customerName, country, and creditLimit for customers ordered by their creditLimit in descending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, country, creditLimit FROM customers ORDER BY creditLimit DESC

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice of all products ordered by buyPrice in ascending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products ORDER BY buyPrice ASC

questions.text: List the employeeNumber, lastName, and jobTitle of employees ordered by lastName in alphabetical order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT employeeNumber, lastName, jobTitle FROM employees ORDER BY lastName ASC

questions.text: List the officeCode, city, and country for all offices ordered by city in descending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT officeCode, city, country FROM offices ORDER BY city DESC

questions.text: List the total number of customers in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCustomers FROM customers

questions.text: List the total number of products in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalProducts FROM products

questions.text: List the total buy price of all products in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT SUM(buyPrice) AS totalBuyPrice FROM products

questions.text: List the average buy price of all products in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT AVG(buyPrice) AS avgBuyPrice FROM products

questions.text: List the minimum buy price of products in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT MIN(buyPrice) AS minBuyPrice FROM products

questions.text: List the maximum buy price of products in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT MAX(buyPrice) AS maxBuyPrice FROM products

questions.text: List all distinct countries where customers are located.
questions.solution_query: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM customers

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice for the product with the highest buy price.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products WHERE buyPrice = (SELECT MAX(buyPrice) FROM products)

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice for the product with the lowest buy price.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products WHERE buyPrice = (SELECT MIN(buyPrice) FROM products)

questions.text: List the customerName and creditLimit for customers with credit limits above $50,000 ordered by creditLimit in descending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, creditLimit FROM customers WHERE creditLimit > 50000 ORDER BY creditLimit DESC

questions.text: List the employeeNumber, firstName, and lastName of employees ordered by firstName in ascending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT employeeNumber, firstName, lastName FROM employees ORDER BY firstName ASC

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and quantityInStock for all products ordered by quantityInStock in ascending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, quantityInStock FROM products ORDER BY quantityInStock ASC

questions.text: List the orderNumber, orderDate, and status for orders ordered by orderDate in descending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT orderNumber, orderDate, status FROM orders ORDER BY orderDate DESC

questions.text: List the total number of orders in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalOrders FROM orders

questions.text: List the total sales amount of all orders in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT SUM(quantityOrdered * priceEach) AS totalSales FROM orderdetails

questions.text: List the average sales amount of all orders in the database.
questions.solution_query: SELECT AVG(quantityOrdered * priceEach) AS avgSales FROM orderdetails

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice for products with a buyPrice above $100 ordered by buyPrice in ascending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products WHERE buyPrice > 100 ORDER BY buyPrice ASC

questions.text: List the productCode, productName, and buyPrice for products with a buyPrice below $50 ordered by productName in descending order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT productCode, productName, buyPrice FROM products WHERE buyPrice < 50 ORDER BY productName DESC

questions.text: List all customer names and their countries ordered by country in alphabetical order.
questions.solution_query: SELECT customerName, country FROM customers ORDER BY country ASC

questions.text: List the total quantity of products ordered in all orders.
questions.solution_query: SELECT SUM(quantityOrdered) AS totalQuantityOrdered FROM orderdetails
